        Formats the HashMap of sample sheet content to String.
        Return value example:
        (['barcode01']='MW_1' ['barcode02']='MW23' ['barcode03']='AA_45' )
        Parameters:
        hmSampleSheet - the sample sheet content in HashMap format.
        Returns:
